text: Davy Crockett, King of the Wild Frontier is a 1955 Walt Disney movie starring Fess Parker as Davy Crockett. It is a compilation of the first 3 Davy Crockett episodes. The episodes used were Davy Crockett Indian Fighter, Davy Crockett Goes to Congress and Davy Crockett at the Alamo. ==References== Category:1955 war movies Category:1950s English-language movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:Disney movies Category:American war movies Category:Movies about revolutions Category:Movies about Native Americans Category:Movies based on real life events Category:Movies based on TV series Category:1950s Western (genre) movies Category:Movies directed by Norman Foster Category:Movies about security and surveillance Category:Movies composed by George Bruns Category:Movies set in the 1810s Category:Movies set in the 1830s Category:Movies set in Tennessee
title: Davy Crockett, King of the Wild Frontier
